byline.contributor: Eli Rosenberg reported from West Harrison, and Rick Rojas from New York. J. David Goodman contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By ELI ROSENBERG and RICK ROJAS

abstract: Friends and colleagues of New York City Detective Joseph Lemm attend his wake at Madison Square Garden; Lemm was killed while serving with United States Air National Guard in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: A wake was held for Detective Joseph Lemm at St. Anthony of Padua in West Harrison, N.Y., and fellow police officers recalled his dedication to the department and the armed forces.

headline.main: Detective Killed in Afghanistan Is Recalled as a Man Dedicated to 2 Uniforms
headline.print_headline: Detective Killed in Afghanistan Is Recalled as a Man Dedicated to 2 Uniforms

snippet: A wake was held for Detective Joseph Lemm at St. Anthony of Padua in West Harrison, N.Y., and fellow police officers recalled his dedication to the department and the armed forces.
